TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit WindowsRuntimeMarshal extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides helper methods for marshaling data between the .NET Framework and the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.IActivationFactory GetActivationFactory(class System.Type type) cil managed

Docs.param: The [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] type to get the activation factory interface for.
Docs.summary: Returns an object that implements the activation factory interface for the specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] type.
Docs.returns: An object that implements the activation factory interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks In addition to the exceptions in the Exceptions section, any `HRESULT` other than `S_OK` that is returned by the underlying factory method will be marshaled as an exception.

Docs.exception:
does not represent a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] type (that is, belonging to the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] itself or defined in a [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] component).
-or-
The object specified for was not provided by the common language runtime type system.

The specified [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] class is not properly registered. For example, the .winmd file was located, but the [!INCLUDE[wrt](~/add/includes/wrt-md.md)] failed to locate the implementation.
Docs.permission: requires full trust for the immediate caller. This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

Docs.returns: An unmanaged pointer to the new [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451), or if is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.WindowsRuntime.WindowsRuntimeMarshal.FreeHString%2A> method to release the [HSTRING](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=246451) when you are done using it.
